title: Provides for the certification of and qualifications for dentists practicing oral and maxillofacial surgery
summary: Provides for the certification of and qualifications for dentists practicing oral and maxillofacial surgery; includes such dentist within provisions of law regulating office-based surgery; provides for a study of whether an oral and maxillofacial surgery profiling program should be established; and provide that in an oral and maxillofacial surgery malpractice action, only a physician may be called as an expert witness at trial.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to amending the definition of the scope of practice of dentistry to authorize certain dentists who are qualified and certified to perform any procedure in the oral and maxillofacial area; and to amend the public health law and the civil practice law and rules, in relation to the discipline and liability of dentists who are so qualified and certified
